FuncDef: The reset qinq statistics interface vlan-group command clears QinQ packet statistics in VLAN groups on a sub-interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a interface.
-

Specifies the type of a interface.
-

Specifies the number of a interface.
-

Specifies the QinQ packet statistics in a specified VLAN group.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset qinq statistics interface GigabitEthernet 1/0/1.1 vlan-group 1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To collect QinQ packet statistics in VLAN groups on a sub-interface for a specific period of time, run the reset qinq statistics command to clear the existing statistics and re-collect the QinQ packet statistics.
Prerequisites
The specified sub-interface and VLAN groups must exist.
Configuration Impact
After you run the reset qinq statistics command, the QinQ packet statistics in VLAN groups on a specified sub-interface are cleared and cannot be restored. Therefore, exercise caution when running the command.
